item.name: Angel of Light
item.text: Flying, vigilance

item.name: Angel of Mercy
item.text: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

item.name: Angelic Blessing
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

item.name: Archangel
item.text: Flying, vigilance

item.name: Ardent Militia
item.text: Vigilance
item.flavorText: Some fight for honor and some for gold, but the militia fight for hearth and home.

item.name: Armageddon
item.text: Destroy all lands.

item.name: Bargain
item.text: Target opponent draws a card. You gain 7 life.
item.flavorText: Bargaining with a goblin is like trading with a child; both believe they already own everything.

item.name: Blinding Light
item.text: Tap all nonwhite creatures.
item.flavorText: Let the unjust avert their faces and contemplate their peril.

item.name: Border Guard
item.flavorText: "Join the army, see foreign countries" they'd said.

item.name: Breath of Life
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.name: Champion Lancer
item.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Champion Lancer by creatures.
item.flavorText: The flash of his lance projects the pure radiance of his honor.

item.name: Charging Paladin
item.text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: A true warrior's thoughts are of victory, not death.

item.name: Devoted Hero
item.flavorText: The heart's courage is the soul's guardian.

item.name: Devout Monk
item.text: When Devout Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
item.flavorText: Discipline wears many robes.

item.name: Eager Cadet
item.flavorText: The enthusiasm of the young, sharpened by the discipline of a soldier.

item.name: False Peace
item.text: Target player skips all combat phases of his or her next turn.
item.flavorText: Mutual consent is not required for war.

item.name: Foot Soldiers
item.flavorText: Infantry deployment is the art of putting your troops in the wrong place at the right time.

item.name: Gerrard's Wisdom
item.text: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.
item.flavorText: "You'll lose a duel if your enemy comes expecting a war."

item.name: Knight Errant
item.flavorText: ". . . Before honor is humility." —The Bible, Proverbs 15:33

item.name: Loyal Sentry
item.text: When Loyal Sentry blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Loyal Sentry.

item.name: Path of Peace
item.text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
item.flavorText: "You could die famous or you could die old. I chose old." —Former soldier

item.name: Righteous Charge
item.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul.

item.name: Righteous Fury
item.text: Destroy all tapped creatures. You gain 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

item.name: Royal Falcon
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Hunter by instinct, weapon by training.

item.name: Royal Trooper
item.text: Whenever Royal Trooper blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: "Fortune does not side with the faint-hearted." —Sophocles, Phaedra

item.name: Sacred Nectar
item.text: You gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "For he on honey-dew hath fed, And drunk the milk of Paradise." —Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "Kubla Khan"

item.name: Steadfastness
item.text: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Brute force wins the battles. Conviction wins the wars.

item.name: Venerable Monk
item.text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

item.name: Vengeance
item.text: Destroy target tapped creature.
item.flavorText: Bitter as wormwood, sweet as mulled wine.

item.name: Veteran Cavalier
item.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
item.flavorText: Spirit is the sword and experience the sharpening stone. —Arabian proverb

item.name: Wild Griffin
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

item.name: Air Elemental
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

item.name: Coral Eel
item.flavorText: Some fishers like to eat eels, and some eels like to eat fishers.

item.name: Counterspell
item.text: Counter target spell.

item.name: Denizen of the Deep
item.text: When Denizen of the Deep enters the battlefield, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.

item.name: Exhaustion
item.text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

item.name: Extinguish
item.text: Counter target sorcery spell.

item.name: Eye Spy
item.text: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into his or her graveyard.

item.name: Giant Octopus
item.flavorText: At the sight of the thing the calamari vendor's eyes went wide, but from fear or avarice none could tell.

item.name: Ingenious Thief
item.text: Flying When Ingenious Thief enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand.

item.name: Man-o'-War
item.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
item.flavorText: Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch.

item.name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
item.flavorText: Are merfolk humans with fins, or are humans merfolk with feet?

item.name: Owl Familiar
item.text: Flying When Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

item.name: Phantom Warrior
item.text: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
item.flavorText: The phantom warrior comes from nowhere and returns there just as quickly.

item.name: Piracy
item.text: Until end of turn, you may tap lands you don't control for mana. Spend this mana only to cast spells.
item.flavorText: The sea gives, and the sea takes. Some just help with the taking.

item.name: Psychic Transfer
item.text: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.

item.name: Ransack
item.text: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. Put any number of them on the bottom of that library in any order and the rest on top of the library in any order.

item.name: Relearn
item.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: The hardest lessons to grasp are the ones you've already learned.

item.name: Remove Soul
item.text: Counter target creature spell.
item.flavorText: When your enemies are denied soldiers, they are denied victory.

item.name: Sea Eagle
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Where air meets water, fish meets talon.

item.name: Sleight of Hand
item.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

item.name: Snapping Drake
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Drakes claim to be dragons—until the dragons show up.

item.name: Storm Crow
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

item.name: Tidings
item.text: Draw four cards.
item.flavorText: "Many wearing rapiers are afraid of goose-quills." —William Shakespeare, Hamlet

item.name: Time Ebb
item.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
item.flavorText: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.

item.name: Time Warp
item.text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
item.flavorText: "Let's do it again" —Squee, goblin cabin hand

item.name: Touch of Brilliance
item.text: Draw two cards.
item.flavorText: "I don't want what I don't have. I want more of what I do have."

item.name: Undo
item.text: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

item.name: Vizzerdrix
item.flavorText: Its swamp cousin may be meaner, but the vizzerdrix is much bigger.

item.name: Water Elemental
item.flavorText: The water that a ship sails on is the same water that swallows it up. —Chinese proverb

item.name: Wind Drake
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings."William Blake, The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

item.name: Wind Sail
item.text: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.
item.flavorText: It pays to be at home both on the sea and in the sky.

item.name: Abyssal Horror
item.text: Flying When Abyssal Horror enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.

item.name: Ancient Craving
item.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
item.flavorText: Knowledge demands sacrifice.

item.name: Bog Imp
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: Don't be fooled by their looks. Think of them as little knives with wings.

item.name: Bog Raiders
item.text: Swampwalk
item.flavorText: Those who live amid decay must expect scavengers.

item.name: Bog Wraith
item.text: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
item.flavorText: It moved through the troops leaving no footprints, save on their souls.

item.name: Chorus of Woe
item.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: When nightstalkers sing, nothing in creation sleeps.

item.name: Coercion
item.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
item.flavorText: "Human tenderness is simply weakness in a pretty package."

item.name: Dakmor Ghoul
item.text: When Dakmor Ghoul enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: "Cursed be the sickly forms that err from honest Nature's rule" —Alfred, Lord Tennyson, "Locksley Hall"

item.name: Dakmor Lancer
item.text: When Dakmor Lancer enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature.
item.flavorText: The darkness of his shield reflects the inky blackness of his soul.

item.name: Dakmor Plague
item.text: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
item.flavorText: The tiniest cough can be deadlier than the fiercest dragon.

item.name: Dakmor Scorpion
item.flavorText: A scorpion this big you won't find curled up in your boot. Maybe around your boot, but not in it.

item.name: Dakmor Sorceress
item.text: Dakmor Sorceress's power is equal to the number of Swamps you control.

item.name: Dark Offering
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: "Our greatest hope has become our enemy's greatest triumph." —Court counselor

item.name: Dread Reaper
item.text: Flying When Dread Reaper enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

item.name: Feral Shadow
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Not all shadows are cast by light—some are cast by darkness.

item.name: Gravedigger
item.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.name: Grim Tutor
item.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library. You lose 3 life.
item.flavorText: He who goes unpunished never learns. —Greek proverb

item.name: Hand of Death
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
item.flavorText: The touch of death is never gentle.

item.name: Hollow Dogs
item.text: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

item.name: Howling Fury
item.text: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: I howl my soul to the moon, and the moon howls with me.

item.name: Mind Rot
item.text: Target player discards two cards.

item.name: Muck Rats
item.flavorText: "Just as some fool said it couldn't get worse, the rats began to show up." —Foot soldier

item.name: Raise Dead
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

item.name: Ravenous Rats
item.text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

item.name: Scathe Zombies
item.flavorText: Luckily for them, it doesn't take much brains to slaughter and maim.

item.name: Serpent Warrior
item.text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
item.flavorText: A hiss before dying.

item.name: Shrieking Specter
item.text: Flying Whenever Shrieking Specter attacks, defending player discards a card.

item.name: Soul Feast
item.text: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: Evil often dines alone.

item.name: Stream of Acid
item.text: Destroy target land or nonblack creature.

item.name: Wicked Pact
item.text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

item.name: Cinder Storm
item.text: Cinder Storm deals 7 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: When the sky's rain has turned to fire, what will put it out?

item.name: Devastation
item.text: Destroy all creatures and lands.
item.flavorText: There is much talk about the art of creation. What about the art of destruction?

item.name: Earth Elemental
item.flavorText: Its voice has the tremor of deafening thunder, its blow the force of an avalanche.

item.name: Fire Elemental
item.flavorText: You are drawn to your death as a moth to the flame.

item.name: Fire Tempest
item.text: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

item.name: Goblin Cavaliers
item.flavorText: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.

item.name: Goblin Chariot
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: They have to replace the wheels, they have to replace the boar, and sometimes they have to replace the goblin.

item.name: Goblin Commando
item.text: When Goblin Commando enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
item.flavorText: With a commando around, somebody's gonna get hurt.

item.name: Goblin General
item.text: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Lead, follow, or run around like crazy.

item.name: Goblin Glider
item.text: Flying Goblin Glider can't block.
item.flavorText: The goblins call the gliders "death from above." Everyone else calls them "clods in the clouds."

item.name: Goblin Hero
item.flavorText: When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero—everyone else just has to step back.

item.name: Goblin Lore
item.text: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.
item.flavorText: "I done forgot more than you'll ever know, pipsqueak." "Yeah—that's your problem."

item.name: Goblin Mountaineer
item.text: Mountainwalk
item.flavorText: Goblin mountaineer, barely keeps his family fed.

item.name: Goblin Settler
item.text: When Goblin Settler enters the battlefield, destroy target land.
item.flavorText: Be it ever so crumbled, there's no place like home.

item.name: Hulking Goblin
item.text: Hulking Goblin can't block.
item.flavorText: The bigger they are, the harder they avoid work.

item.name: Hulking Ogre
item.text: Hulking Ogre can't block.
item.flavorText: Once they realized the ogre had more size than speed, the soldiers simply went around it.

item.name: Jagged Lightning
item.text: Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to each of two target creatures.

item.name: Last Chance
item.text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

item.name: Lava Axe
item.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: Meant to cut through the body and burn straight to the soul.

item.name: Mons's Goblin Raiders
item.flavorText: Just because they have a club doesn't mean they're organized.

item.name: Ogre Warrior
item.flavorText: Assault and battery included.

item.name: Raging Goblin
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

item.name: Relentless Assault
item.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

item.name: Scorching Spear
item.text: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Lift your spear as you might lift your glass, and toast your enemy.

item.name: Spitting Earth
item.text: Spitting Earth deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature.

item.name: Stone Rain
item.text: Destroy target land.

item.name: Thunder Dragon
item.text: Flying When Thunder Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.

item.name: Trained Orgg
item.flavorText: All orggs know how to kill; training teaches them what to kill.

item.name: Tremor
item.text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
item.flavorText: One little goblin shook up the ground. When the dust cleared, no one was found.

item.name: Volcanic Dragon
item.text: Flying, haste
item.flavorText: Speed and fire are always a deadly combination.

item.name: Volcanic Hammer
item.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

item.name: Alluring Scent
item.text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
item.flavorText: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.

item.name: Barbtooth Wurm
item.flavorText: In its lair lies a carpet of bones.

item.name: Bull Hippo
item.text: Islandwalk
item.flavorText: Stay alert: his lumbering may shake the ground itself, but in water, he glides.

item.name: Durkwood Boars
item.flavorText: "And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine; and the herd ran violently . . . ."The Bible, Mark 5:13

item.name: Gorilla Warrior
item.flavorText: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

item.name: Grizzly Bears
item.flavorText: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.

item.name: Lone Wolf
item.text: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

item.name: Lynx
item.text: Forestwalk
item.flavorText: Rarely seen, hardly heard, never caught.

item.name: Monstrous Growth
item.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The nightstalkers' little game of tease-the-squirrel suddenly took an unexpected turn.

item.name: Moon Sprite
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "I am that merry wanderer of the night." —William Shakespeare, A Midsummer Night's Dream

item.name: Natural Spring
item.text: Target player gains 8 life.
item.flavorText: The dying ask for water because they know it contains life.

item.name: Nature's Cloak
item.text: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn.

item.name: Nature's Lore
item.text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Every seed planted is another lesson the forest can teach us.

item.name: Norwood Archers
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: "‘Air superiority?' Not while our archers scan the skies." —Elvish scout

item.name: Norwood Ranger
item.flavorText: Some trees bear deadly fruit.

item.name: Pride of Lions
item.text: You may have Pride of Lions assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

item.name: Renewing Touch
item.text: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.
item.flavorText: Death just encourages life the more.

item.name: Silverback Ape
item.flavorText: His true majesty is not in his silver, but in his size.

item.name: Southern Elephant
item.flavorText: Neither predator nor prey, the elephant chooses its place in the battle.

item.name: Squall
item.text: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.
item.flavorText: "To-night the winds begin to rise . . . The rooks are blown about the skies . . . ." —Alfred, Lord Tennyson, In Memoriam

item.name: Summer Bloom
item.text: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.
item.flavorText: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

item.name: Sylvan Basilisk
item.text: Whenever Sylvan Basilisk becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature.

item.name: Sylvan Yeti
item.text: Sylvan Yeti's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
item.flavorText: The deeper the wood, the greater its strength.

item.name: Thorn Elemental
item.text: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

item.name: Untamed Wilds
item.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Whiptail Wurm
item.flavorText: It's hard to say for certain which end is more dangerous.

item.name: Whirlwind
item.text: Destroy all creatures with flying.

item.name: Wild Ox
item.text: Swampwalk
item.flavorText: It has the run of the swamps, and it knows it.

item.name: Willow Elf
item.flavorText: The forest lives in the elf as the elf lives in the forest.

item.name: Wood Elves
item.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.text: G

item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.text: U

item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.text: B
